full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI LAM RIM PA GNYIS KYI RNAL 'BYOR LA SLOB TSUL ZUNG 'JUG SGRUB PA'I THEM SKAS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @067A *, ,(CES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI BSKYED PA'I RIM PA LA SLOB PA'I TSUL 'DI NI, RANG GI SLOB MA RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN SOGS MANG POS BSKUL BA'I DON DU, CHOS SMRA BA'I BTZUN PA DAM CHOS DPAL 'BYOR GYIS RANG LO RE BDUN GYI THOG MON BOD KYI MTSAMS, ,CHOS SKYONG BEG TZE LCAM SRING GI PHO BRANG DBEN GNAS DPAL LDAN SGOM SBUG TU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI LHO DGON GYI RIGS LAS BYUNG BA'I RNAM DPYOD PHUN SUM TSOGS PA MDO SNGAGS RAB 'BYAMS LA BLO MIG YANGS PA'I 'BRONG RTZE CHOS RJE YE SHES DPAL 'BYOR GYIS BGYIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
